title: PolitiFact - Josh Mandel says Sen. Sherrod Brown rates as the most liberal in the United States
subtitle: When a Republican calls someone a liberal, it’s not meant as a compliment. Add the modifier "most liberal member of the
author: www.politifact.com
vclaim: "Sherrod Brown was just voted two years in a row the most liberal senator in the United States of America" and is more liberal than Sen. Bernie Sanders.
